author: vors
body: - Merge changes from source-depot branch 5386c71bb - Add `Start-ResGen` to `PowerShellGitHubDev.psm1` So now everybody can regenerate C# binding locally, when needed We still keep them into a sub-module, until `dotnet cli` will suport C# binding generation. The reason is: we need to be able to build PS without having PS on the system, so we keep binding in a submodule. - In windows-build submodule, move C# binding to the real project names. I.e. `gen\SYS_AUTO` to `gen\System.Management.Automation` **Review note:** please, do the review per commit: file changes are the mix of `source-depot` merge and real changes. It would be much easier to do the review per commit. --- This change is [](https://reviewable.io/reviews/powershell/powershell/762)
title: Add changes from source-depot branch and Start-ResGen
